name: ai.cerb.record.profileImageEditor.text
description: Create a profile image from text
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      title: Create image with text
      elements:
        text/prompt_text:
          label: Text:
          required@bool: yes
          type: freeform
          placeholder: Text or emoji
          max_length: 32
  
  return:
    image:
      text@key: prompt_text
policy_kata:
commands:
  # [TODO] Specify a command policy here (use Ctrl+Space for autocompletion)
